P=plasma (eg citrate bottle); S=serum (clotted; no anticoagulant); B=whole blood (EDTA bottle);
ABG=arterial blood gas).
1 See OHCS p9 for reference intervals in pregnancy.
2 The sample requires special handling: contact the laboratory.
3 Desired upper limit of cholesterol would be <6mmol/L. In some populations, 7.8mmol/L is the top 
end of the distribution.
